name: Hungry Lanternfish
description:
Use your cursor to guide the lanternfish. Gain points by eating food. Careful! No sunlight reaches this deep.

Jam: Trijam 76

Theme: Imposters

All art, music, sounds, and code were created during the three hour development time.

Known bug: Enemies won't chase you when they are triggered for the first time. I was not able to fix the behavior in the three hour window.
